duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and maintain comprehensive fundraising strategies to identify and engage major giving prospects.
Manage and coordinate regional fundraising efforts for Major Gifts Program, National accounts, and Gift Planning.
Raise a minimum of $1,500,000 within the first year through private special funding, multi-year commitments, and gift planning.
Network with current donors to locate new giving prospects who can make major gifts.
Represent World Vision US in speaking engagements directly related to major gift development and media interviews.
Arrange interactions between major donors and World Vision US leadership and project sites.
Work with the gift planning staff to set up donor-advised funds, stock gifts, wills, etc.
Attend job-related training programs and stay informed of organizational announcements and activities.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or equivalent (eight years) work experience in fundraising or sales (Master's preferred)
